channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Nifty News: Queen, HSBC filings hint at NFTs, Yuga teases robot game and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The rock band Queen and big bank HSBC eye up the metaverse while Yuga Labs launched the next iteration of its NFT gaming saga.

item.title: Tech giant Alibaba announces crypto-friendly chair following Daniel Zhang stepping down
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The next company chair of Alibaba has backed several crypto projects through his wealth manager and tweeted he “like[s] crypto” in December 2021.

item.title: Five US enforcement agencies form new digital currency anti-crime task force
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The agencies have worked together for years, but now their joint efforts are official as they plan to ramp up activity.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price rallied over $28,000 as investors’ excitement over BlackRock and Fidelity Investments applying for spot BTC ETFs fuels dreams of a BTC price recovery.

item.title: Polygon co-founder proposes zkEVM ‘validium’ upgrade to improve security
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Mihailo Bjelic suggested that adding zero-knowledge proof technology could bolster the network’s security while still keeping fees low.

item.title: Lack of bipartisan support on crypto regulation could make US ‘less attractive’ to firms: Moody’s
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A report from the investors’ service pointed to a political divide in language on bills concerning stablecoins and providing a comprehensive framework for digital assets.

item.title: Binance to implement Lightning Network nodes for enhanced Bitcoin transactions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Binance hopes to enable smooth BTC deposits and withdrawals while tackling network congestion issues.

item.title: Biden to discuss dangers of AI in San Francisco meeting with experts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The U.S. president will meet with AI experts to discuss safety, policy and opportunities while he’s in San Francisco.

item.title: Czech automobile conglomerate Škoda Auto launches NFT platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The nonfungible token platform was launched in partnership with Near Protocol.

item.title: Tether and Bitfinex pledge $100K grant for private operating system
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “If you’re serious about security, @QubesOS is the best OS available today," commented Edward Snowden in a previous tweet.

item.title: BIS releases unified-ledger proposal for cross-border, tokenized asset transactions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Like the IMF’s single-ledger proposal released a day earlier, BIS’ unified ledger uses familiar concepts, such as tokenization, without the blockchain.

item.title: Deutsche Bank crypto plans aid Bitcoin price trip to $27.5K June highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin price performance nails its highest levels this month, but analysts are waiting for the weekly candle close.

item.title: Wall Street giants back EDX Markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: EDX Markets is backed by large financial institutions such as Citadel Securities, Fidelity Investments and Charles Schwab.

item.title: Gemini plans Asia-Pacific expansion as part of ‘next wave of growth for crypto’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The crypto exchange has already announced efforts to expand into Canada and Europe amid a lawsuit from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: Crypto VC market flashes green amid macroeconomic recession alarms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: May 2023 marked the second consecutive month of crypto VC activity growth, surpassing $1 billion in funding for the first time since September 2022.

item.title: How to use ChatGPT to write a resume
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Craft an impressive resume that highlights your skills and experiences with the help of ChatGPT!

item.title: Stablecoin protocol Reserve invests $20M in Convex, Curve and Stake DAO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Reserve team said the investment could allow for new features such as collateralized loans and wallet products.

item.title: EU consumer protection groups urge governments to investigate AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A coalition of watchdog groups in the EU urged governments to assess the risks and vulnerabilities consumers are subjected to due to generative AI.

item.title: Peter McCormack’s Twitter regrets: ‘I can feel myself being a dick’ — Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Podcaster Peter McCormack has a love/hate relationship with Twitter and admits he can sometimes be “a dick to other people” online.

item.title: Era of trading crypto as non-securities is over, says exchange exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: SEC-regulated firm INX only lists five cryptocurrencies on its platform, considering them non-securities.

item.title: Branding: The layer-1 of a successful Web3 marketing strategy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By German Ramirez
item.description: Building on a blockchain follows similar fundamental principles to building in real life.

item.title: Investing in Web3 is a ‘hedge against disruption’ — Corporate VC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Martin El-Khouri, a senior director at Bertelsmann Investments, spoke with Cointelegraph at the Proof of Talk conference on the state of VC investments in Web3.

item.title: European Investment Bank taps blockchain for Climate Awareness Bond
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The Swedish krona-based Climate Awareness Bond will be issued on a blockchain that incentivizes node operators to improve the environmental footprint of infrastructure.

item.title: 4 things that can spark the next Bitcoin bull cycle
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Bitcoin is down 15% from its 2023 highs, but $40,000 may be closer than you think due to several important factors.

item.title: Deutsche Bank reportedly applies for digital asset custody license from BaFin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Germany’s banking industry is slowly warming up to the crypto sector, with multiple partnerships and crypto services launching in 2023 after a long, cautious approach.

item.title: IMF’s CBDC push gets feedback from the crypto community — ‘No one wants this’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A community member described CBDCs as a “dystopian nightmare” and argued that they would give governments complete control over individuals.

item.title: Bitcoin price ‘sideways boredom’ may last 18 months — New research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price cycles suggest that an “arduous road” lies ahead for patient Bitcoin hodlers.

item.title: Binance denies affiliation with entity registered in UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Binance has denied claims it's been using a small building shared with thousands of other companies as its registered office in the U.K.

item.title: 31% of young Aussies hold crypto despite being ‘risk averse’ — ASX survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: While young Australians are more interested in crypto, it’s the 25- to 49-year-olds who own the most.

item.title: Binance’s BNB Chain introduces layer-2 testnet powered by Optimism
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Binance-founded blockchain has introduced a new layer-2 chain opBNB, though some suggest there are other ways to scale the network.
